text: Jorge Cardona Marquez (born November 2, 1987 in Zaragoza) is a table tennis athlete from Spain. He has a physical disability: he is class 10 player. He played table tennis at the 2008 Summer Paralympics and the 2012 Summer Paralympics. In 2008, he finished second in team table tennis. In 2012, he finished third in team Class 9-10. == References == Category:Spanish table tennis players Category:Living people Category:1987 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:People from Zaragoza Category:2008 Summer Paralympics Category:2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type Class 10
title: Jorge Cardona
